name: Eternal (DevonGritton, LiamBansal, Dango)
description:
This is a Demo Build and will change before full release

A low poly, Souls Like indie game featuring arcade-like combat mechanics. Made by a group of placement students at the University Of Gloucestershire. Features a robust combat system with both weapon and enemy variety.

Navigate through this demo level and open chests to find weapons to slay enemies. This is a demo build of our project and we aim to implement many more mechanics features and levels in the coming months.

Control Scheme:

  • Keyboard and Mouse Controls: 
  •  Mouse Movement = 
  • Camera Movement 
  •  W = Froward
  •  S = Backwards 
  • A = Left
  • D = Right
  •  Left Mouse Button = Attack/Combo
  •  Middle Mouse Button = Lock-On to Target
  •  Right Mouse Button = Blocking/Defence
  •  Q (While locked on) = Move lock-on Target to Left 
  •  E (While locked on) = Move Lock-on Target to Right 
  •  ESC = Menus
  •  Tap Space = Roll/Dodge 
  •  Hold Space = Sprint
  •  E = Interaction
  • X = Use Consumable
  •  Left Arrow Key = Switch left hand Item
  •  Right Arrow Key = Switch Right hand Item
  •  Down Arrow Key = Switch current Potion 
  •  Up Arrow Key = Switch current consumable (edited)

This game also features controller support featured in one of the screenshots

"Left-hand quickslots are designed for defensive items such as shields, there is a known bug about dual-wielding weapons not working. So for now please use the right-hand slot for weapons and the left-hand slots for shields exclusively to avoid the bug."

"There is also a known bug regarding potions, the health potion item will duplicate if you spam the x key while it's selected so once it's pressed wait until it finishes the effect and animation."

"The stamina potion will play an effect twice and also heal the player"
